description:
Peter Benjamin Parker is the superhero vigilante known as “Spider-Man” and the son of Richard and Mary Parker. Orphaned at the age of five, Peter was raised by his aunt and uncle over the course of the next few years. Parker's search for answers about the mystery of his parents and their deaths eventually drove him to investigating the establishment of Oscorp, having learned that their employee, Dr. Curt Connors, had been close friends with his father.

#AndrewGarfield
